posts.message:
Could any one help me to solve this exception:
I have published an arc gis map on arc gis (local) server  as a service
I want to consume it in windows phone 8 app 
using Arc Gis Phone SDK for .Net 
when I run the emulator I found 
[An exception of type 'System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException' ]occurred in System.ni.dll but was not handled in user code]
the inner exception details : the remote server reply with  not found 
I can't find any solution and this exception appears with all code samples :(

posts.message: How to Select from Data Table in C# by Amr Saafan
posts.caption: amrsaafan.blogspot.com
posts.description: DataTable Object has a Select Method which acts like Where in SQL Server. So if you want to write filter query you write the column name directly without Where and the filter expression you want.
